docs.snippet: The star point guard Chris Paul, who returned Sunday after an 18-game absence, is set to lead Los Angeles against Portland, which has struggled recently with its 3-point shooting....

docs.snippet: After Mike Woodson acknowledged that his job security was probably an issue on his players’ minds, the Knicks fell to the Thunder, with Kevin Durant scoring 41 points....
docs.lead_paragraph: After Mike Woodson acknowledged that his job security was probably an issue on his players’ minds, the Knicks fell to the Thunder, with Kevin Durant scoring 41 points.
docs.abstract: Oklahoma City Thunder beat New York Knicks, 112-100; Knicks coach Mike Woodson acknowledges that questions about his job security are likely weighing on his players' minds.

docs.abstract: NBA Roundup; Detroit Pistons fire coach Maurice Cheeks after less than a year on the job, with the Pistons languishing well below .500 despite off-season moves aimed at putting the struggling franchise back in contention; other basketball news noted.

docs.snippet: North Korea has rescinded an invitation for a senior U.S. official to visit Pyongyang to seek the release of imprisoned U.S. missionary Kenneth Bae, a State Department official said on Sunday, adding civil rights activist Jesse Jackson had offered...
docs.lead_paragraph: North Korea has rescinded an invitation for a senior U.S. official to visit Pyongyang to seek the release of imprisoned U.S. missionary Kenneth Bae, a State Department official said on Sunday, adding civil rights activist Jesse Jackson had offered to go to Pyongyang to try to free Bae.

headline.main: North Korea Rescinds Invite to Seek Bae Release
